title: Manu
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Indian, International, Italian, Delivery, Take-out
description: Serves international vegan and vegetarian food, mostly Indian and Italian. Day menu till 5pm then evening specials. No alcohol. Directions: Take bus 4 or 5 from city centre (Jungfernstieg or central station) till Grindelhof stop, or bus 15 till Bezirksamt Eimsb√ºttel and walk minutes up (bus 4,5) or down (bus 15). Or take underground U1 till Hallerstrasse and walk west via Hallerplatz along Grindelhof.
